page.title: 16Bramhope: Saturday
page.content: On a typical Saturday the parents are woken by the youngest creeping into their bed.Everyone is up and breakfasted by 08.30 when father works in his study,mother does the housework and the children watch television.At 10.00 the family go swimming and have lunch at 12.30.While the parents garden,the children play until 17.30 when they have tea.From 19.00 onwards they bathe and are in bed by 21.00.The parents have their evening meal watching television going to bed between 23.00 and 0.00.
